WHO WE ARE

This project is mainly designed by François Fouquet and Erwan Daubert.

The development team is the following: Olivier Barais, Jean-Émile Dartois, Johann Bourcier, Brice Morin, Grégory Nain, Noël Plouzeau, Gerson Sunye, Jean-Marc Jézéquel

The development of Kevoree is currently supported by

INRIA Rennes
Université de Rennes 1
Interdisciplinary Center for Security, Reliability and Trust (SnT)
Université du Luxembourg
